method.text: Chop the butter into small cubes
Sieve the flour and salt, and add the butter cubes
Blitz the butter and flour in a food processor until it forms breadcrumbs

Sprinkle the water onto the crumbs and work into a (fairly dry) dough. You want to work it as little as possible - the more it is worked the tougher the dough will be. It'll look like it doesn't have enough water, but it will probably come together
Leave to rest for 20-30 minutes, covered with clingfilm

notes.text: Before and throughout the process you should chill everything as much as possible, whenever possible - both ingredients and equipment
